channel.title: (URGENT!) need help with 317 and linux VPS
channel.description:
i have done everything to a 'T' but i get this error message when running run.sh -----> java -Xmx500m -classpath .:./jython.jar:./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server <----- is my run.sh command
and below is the error
bash-4.1# screen -a -m -d -s rsps #!/bin/sh bash-4.1# java -Xmx500m -classpath .:./jython.jar:./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar Usage: java [-options] class [args...] (to execute a class) or java [-options] -jar jarfile [args...] (to execute a jar file) where options include: -d32 use a 32-bit data model if available -d64 use a 64-bit data model if available -server to select the "server" VM The default VM is server.
-cp <class search path of directories and zip/jar files> -classpath <class search path of directories and zip/jar files> A : separated list of directories, JAR archives, and ZIP archives to search for class files. -D<name>=<value> set a system property -verbose:[class|gc|jni] enable verbose output -version print product version and exit -version:<value> require the specified version to run -showversion print product version and continue -jre-restrict-search | -no-jre-restrict-search include/exclude user private JREs in the version search -? -help print this help message -X print help on non-standard options -ea[:<packagename>...|:<classname>] -enableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>] enable assertions with specified granularity -da[:<packagename>...|:<classname>] -disableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>] disable assertions with specified granularity -esa | -enablesystemassertions enable system assertions -dsa | -disablesystemassertions disable system assertions -agentlib:<libname>[=<options>] load native agent library <libname>, e.g. -agentlib:hprof see also, -agentlib:jdwp=help and -agentlib:hprof=help -agentpath:<pathname>[=<options>] load native agent library by full pathname -javaagent:<jarpath>[=<options>] load Java programming language agent, see java.lang.instrument -splash:<imagepath> show splash screen with specified image
anything will help, im currently using puTTY, i have a linux vps, and a 317 delta based server. just bought the VPS today and i need to get this server up ASAP, most rep to whoever can help and possibly a mod position on my server

item.title: (URGENT!) need help with 317 and linux VPS

item.description:
@ducie wrote:

thank you so much! ill try this and let you know!

item.title: (URGENT!) need help with 317 and linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Update your java jdk to the latest version and recompile the files.
This is an error that occurs because you have a lower java version, than the files were compiled with

Read full topic
item.source: (URGENT!) need help with 317 and linux VPS

item.title: (URGENT!) need help with 317 and linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @ducie ducie
item.description:
@ducie wrote:

i have done everything to a ‘T’ but i get this error message when running run.sh -----> java -Xmx500m -classpath .:./jython.jar:./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server <----- is my run.sh command

                                                   and below is the error

bash-4.1# screen -a -m -d -s rsps #!/bin/sh
bash-4.1# java -Xmx500m -classpath .:./jython.jar:./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar
Usage: java [-options] class [args…]
(to execute a class)
or java [-options] -jar jarfile [args…]
(to execute a jar file)
where options include:
-d32 use a 32-bit data model if available
-d64 use a 64-bit data model if available
-server to select the “server” VM
The default VM is server.

-cp <class search path of directories and zip/jar files>
-classpath <class search path of directories and zip/jar files>
              A : separated list of directories, JAR archives,
              and ZIP archives to search for class files.
-D<name>=<value>
              set a system property
-verbose:[class|gc|jni]
              enable verbose output
-version      print product version and exit
-version:<value>
              require the specified version to run
-showversion  print product version and continue
-jre-restrict-search | -no-jre-restrict-search
              include/exclude user private JREs in the version search
-? -help      print this help message
-X            print help on non-standard options
-ea[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
-enableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
              enable assertions with specified granularity
-da[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
-disableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
              disable assertions with specified granularity
-esa | -enablesystemassertions
              enable system assertions
-dsa | -disablesystemassertions
              disable system assertions
-agentlib:<libname>[=<options>]
              load native agent library <libname>, e.g. -agentlib:hprof
              see also, -agentlib:jdwp=help and -agentlib:hprof=help
-agentpath:<pathname>[=<options>]
              load native agent library by full pathname
-javaagent:<jarpath>[=<options>]
              load Java programming language agent, see java.lang.instrument
-splash:<imagepath>
              show splash screen with specified image

anything will help, im currently using puTTY, i have a linux vps, and a 317 delta based server. just bought the VPS today and i need to get this server up ASAP, most rep to whoever can help and possibly a mod position on my server

Read full topic
